author: philip
msg: When building apr and apr-util with builddir != srcdir make sure they
build in the builddir. Revert revision 1134, which also tried to do
this, as it doesn't work.
* ac-helpers/apr.m4: Fix up some of the APR_FIND_APR values. Add
<builddir>/apr/include to SVN_EXTRA_INCLUDES.
* ac-helpers/aprutil.m4: Fix up some of the APR_FIND_APU values. Force
creation of <builddir>/apr-util/xml/expat/ before configuring apr-util.

author: kfogel
msg: All right, enough is enough.  It's silly to force users to care about
capitalization of keyword names in the `svn:keywords' property.  Ben,
I was wrong, you were right. :-)
* subversion/libsvn_wc/props.c: include apr_general.h for strcasecmp.
(expand_keyword): Use strcasecmp when comparing against the short
versions of keywords.
* HACKING: Set the svn:keywords property to "date".

author: kfogel
msg: * notes/guis/pics/README: Remove note about adding images
with -kb.  That must have been referring to some other version control
system.

author: kfogel
msg: * subversion/libsvn_wc/get_editor.c (make_patch_open_tag): Pass
"--silent" to patch program.
Ever since Philip Martin fixed svn_io_run_cmd() in revision 893, the
user sees whatever the patch program prints.  In most cases, patch is
quiet, but when it does hunk adjustment, it chats by default.  See
http://subversion.tigris.org/servlets/ReadMsg?msgId=55760&listName=dev
for more on this situation.
With the --silent flag, patch will only chat when it encounters
problems, such as hunk application failure:
$ svn up
G  ./A/D/G/pi
1 out of 1 hunk FAILED -- saving rejects to rho.61556.00001.rej
C  ./A/D/G/rho
U  ./A/D/G/tau
Maybe we should leave it like this -- drawing attention to conflicts
isn't such a bad thing.  But it interferes with automated parsing.
Hmmm.

author: kfogel
msg: Use APR the way it was meant to be used.  Music by Greg Stein, lyrics
by Karl Fogel:
* subversion/clients/cmdline/main.c (revision_from_word): Use
strcasecmp, not apr_strnatcasecmp.
(valid_revision_number): Use apr_isdigit instead of inline code.
Also, nab a couple of compiler warnings:
* subversion/libsvn_wc/entries.c (fold_entry): Constify `name' and
`url' parameters, now that svn_wc__tweak_entry() is a caller.
